mapper.select: SELECT * FROM saas_users WHERE username = #{username} AND deleted_at IS NULL
SELECT * FROM saas_users WHERE email = #{email} AND deleted_at IS NULL
SELECT * FROM saas_users WHERE tenant_id = #{tenantId} AND deleted_at IS NULL ORDER BY created_at DESC
SELECT r.role_code FROM saas_roles r INNER JOIN saas_user_roles ur ON r.id = ur.role_id WHERE ur.user_id = #{userId}::uuid AND r.deleted_at IS NULL AND ur.deleted_at IS NULL

SELECT DISTINCT p.permission_code FROM saas_permissions p INNER JOIN saas_role_permissions rp ON p.id = rp.permission_id INNER JOIN saas_user_roles ur ON rp.role_id = ur.role_id WHERE ur.user_id = #{userId}::uuid AND p.deleted_at IS NULL AND rp.deleted_at IS NULL AND ur.deleted_at IS NULL
